biotools.summary: A simulation platform for generating synthetic images of fluorescence-stained cell populations with realistic properties. Moreover, the synthetic images can be used for validating analysis methods for automated image cytometry, and for comparing their performance.

bioschemas.name: SIMCEP
bioschemas.summary: A simulation platform for generating synthetic images of fluorescence-stained cell populations with realistic properties. Moreover, the synthetic images can be used for validating analysis methods for automated image cytometry, and for comparing their performance.
